Interface Tameable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, EntityAnimal, EntityLiving, LivingBase
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Horse, Ocelot, Wolf

    public interface Tameable
extends EntityAnimal
    Tameable wrapper
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)
